visual_desc: EXT. RUINS - FORGED ALLIANCE. Quick, intense sequence: <Queen Sera> and <The Wolf> lock eyes across the chaotic battlefield where the undead surge. They exchange a sharp, grim nod of necessity. They simultaneously plunge into the surging tide of the undead, initiating desperate, violent hand-to-hand combat against decaying bone.
